channel.title: CVE Feed for Gerbv -- gerbv
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Gerbv -- gerbv

item.title: CVE-2021-40400|2024-08-04T02:44:09.920Z -- gerbv -- gerbv
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the RS-274X aperture macro outline primitive functionality of Gerbv 2.7.0 and dev (commit b5f1eacd) and the forked version of Gerbv (commit d7f42a9a). A specially-crafted Gerber file can lead to information disclosure. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-40402|2024-08-04T02:44:10.059Z -- gerbv -- gerbv
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the RS-274X aperture macro multiple outline primitives functionality of Gerbv 2.7.0 and dev (commit b5f1eacd), and Gerbv forked 2.7.1 and 2.8.0. A specially-crafted Gerber file can lead to information disclosure. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
